array_option_1: What is the current state of the network?
What are the top sources/destinations of flows?
What is the aggregate flow data for data archives?
What are the top flows by organization?
What do individual flows look like?
What are the top flows by country?
What are the flows by science discipline?
What are the flows by project?
What are the patterns in science data transfers in the network?
What are the bandwidth patterns in the network?
What are the patterns of loss in the network?
What are the patterns of latency in the network?
What are the current flow data summary statistics?
Who are the top talkers over time?

panels.content:
Individual Flows per Country

This dashboard shows per-flow level data, given a particular source and destination country.
The table shows the volume, rate, duration (in hours, minutes and seconds), retransmits and round trip time (RTT) for each flow.
Please note that retransmit and RTT information are only available for archive flow data;
and rate and duration will be zero for flows where only one sample was detected.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: ((meta.src_country_name.keyword:$src AND meta.dst_country_name.keyword:$dest) OR (meta.src_country_name.keyword:$dest AND meta.dst_country_name.keyword:$src)) AND meta.sensor_id.keyword:$sensors
